alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 5:40AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marion County through 630 AM EDT... At 539 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston Municipal Airport, or near Williston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Fort McCoy, Lynne, Sparr, Anthony, Silver Springs Shores, Santos, Ocala Airport and Reddick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
